TopicTitle: any1 knows a good lets play with mods

Articles.Content:
hey, does any1 know a good lets play with mods?

and not only with one but with like remotetech and such.

preferably the latests version.

I love Plerborian. His latest ep was a few hours before the update, but I think a new episode will be out today or tommorrow.... He uses mods and has great plans, which is a giant ship that will travel the universe.

I have a let's play with a bunch of mods going. And I'm always open to suggestion to try other mods. Here is the latest Episode:

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/hFVFba7IC-k?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

I personally love the Scoot Manley set.

He don't just do missions but other things and he is some sort of astronomer or something. He also got his wee lass to design a ship for him to fly. He is also Scottish

http://www.youtube.com/user/szyzyg/videos?flow=grid&view=0

TheWinterOwl has just returned to the KSP scene after a long hiatus, you should definitely go check him out. Also may I suggest Scott Manley (think his YT name is Syzygy) who although rarely* uses mods, the stuff he teaches is absolute gold. a few others I can think of off the top of my head are DamionRayne's own LP (NavyRayne), Danny2462 and of course the great Kurt Jmac.

As for me my new series begins next week with a rant about how ALL of my designs have been broken by the new update but by then I will probably have something even better.

(probably should say cheers to the guys who have recommended me, nice on )

Edited September 22, 2012 by Pleborian

I have a let's play with a bunch of mods going. And I'm always open to suggestion to try other mods. Here is the latest Episode:
